name: xnegeqd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cxne(c0), cxne(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxne(c0), cxne(c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cxne(c0), cxne(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
-| wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cxne(c0), cxne(c1)))

|- wi(w0, wceq(cxne(c0), cxne(c1)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))

comment: Equality of two extended numbers with ` -e ` in front of them. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
